content.question: Which of the following could be the single action performed?

choices.label: Gas molecules were removed from the container.
Energy was added to the gas by heating.
The piston was unlocked and pulled out.
The piston was unlocked and pushed in.

content.answer: Energy was added to the gas by heating.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
